author: Richard Phillips
method: Blanch the broccoli in a pan of boiling salted water for two minutes. Drain. Melt the butter in a pan until foaming, then add the blanched broccoli and sesame seeds. Cook for 2-3 minutes, then squeeze in the lemon juice. Cook for a further two minutes, or until the broccoli is tender.  Spoon into a dish and serve.
ingredients: 1 head broccoli, separated into florets,  25g/1oz butter,  2 tbsp sesame seeds,  ½ lemon
